Title: Planet of the Ood
Plot:
Location: Ood-Sphere
Date: 4126
Enemies: Mr. Halpen, Ood Operations 

The Doctor and Donna find themselves on an icy planet known as the Ood-Sphere. There they discover what drove the Ood to be a servant race.
GuestStars: Tim McInnerny (Mr. Halpen), Silas Carson (Voice of the Ood), Paul Kasey (The Ood), Tariq Jordan (Rep), Roger Griffiths (Commander Kess), Paul Clayton (Mr Bartle), Ayesha Dharker (Solona Mercurio), Adrian Raw
